game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player is a Scrabble player with a name, score and frame.
    Author:
    Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Rajit Banerjee, 18202817, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921 Team 15: DarkMode
